meanings.definition: Select, organize, and present (online content, merchandise, information, etc.) using professional or expert knowledge.
meanings.sent1: The librarian curated a special collection of books for the children's section.
meanings.sent2: She curated a beautiful art exhibition at the museum.
meanings.sent3: The chef curated a menu that featured unique and delicious dishes.
meanings.sent4: The teacher curated a list of recommended books for her students to read.
meanings.sent5: The designer curated a stunning display of jewelry for the fashion show.

meanings.definition: To be in charge of selecting and organizing items in a collection or exhibition.
meanings.sent1: The museum curator curated a fascinating exhibit on ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent2: She curated the items in the antique shop to attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: The gardener curated a beautiful arrangement of flowers in the botanical garden.
meanings.sent4: The historian curated a collection of artifacts from different time periods.
meanings.sent5: The artist curated a gallery showcasing her latest paintings.
